sections.title: Beneath The Sea
sections.subtitle: Unveiling Ocean Mysteries
sections.mainDescription: Add a stunning new dimension to your experience at Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo by entering the larger-than-life aquarium tunnel. Step into the diversity of the open ocean as you walk through this extraordinary 48-metre-long tunnel, 11 metres below the surface. Watch colourful fish dart between coral formations and witness rays glide gracefully overhead.

features.Walk Amongst Marine Life: Feel the magic as you become part of this underwater world, surrounded by a vibrant tapestry of fish and rays.
features.Witness the Feeding Frenzy: Witness a thrilling spectacle as skilled divers engage in feeding sessions with sharks and rays, offering a glimpse into their fascinating feeding behaviours.
features.Discover Tranquillity in the Deep: Immerse yourself in the peaceful ambiance of the tunnel. Escape the everyday as you observe the movements of the underwater world.
features.360-Degree Ocean Views: Experience the wonder of being completely surrounded by marine life with our unique tunnel design offering panoramic underwater views from every angle.

sections.title: Aquatic Encounters
sections.subtitle: Journey Through Diverse Ecosystems
sections.mainDescription: Underwater Zoo showcases the spectacular diversity of life in our rivers and oceans through three distinct ecological zones â€“ Rainforest, Rocky Shore and Living Ocean. Watch out for a vast array of aquatic animals across 40 individual displays:

features.Rainforest: Journey through lush vegetation where freshwater fish thrive alongside amphibians and reptiles. Piranhas, giant catfish, playful otters and water rats are just some of the animals you'll meet here.
features.Rocky Shore: Where land meets sea, experience rugged beauty where only the toughest survive. Reach out and touch some of the hardier rock pool inhabitants for a truly immersive experience.
features.Living Ocean: Venture into this underwater world where coral reefs shimmer and graceful sharks patrol the expanse.
features.Get Up Close and Personal: Get nose-to-nose with our incredible inhabitants including playful otters and mischievous penguins!

sections.title: Conservation & Education
sections.subtitle: Making Waves for Wildlife
sections.mainDescription: Join us in our mission to protect marine life through education and conservation. Our dedicated team works tirelessly to ensure the well-being of our 140+ species while contributing to global conservation efforts. From rescue operations to breeding programs, discover how we're making a difference for ocean life.

features.Behind the Scenes Tours: Go beyond the glass and discover what it takes to maintain one of the world's largest aquarium tanks. Learn about our state-of-the-art filtration systems and meet our passionate marine biologists.
features.Educational Programs: Engage with interactive workshops designed for all ages. From school field trips to specialized marine biology courses, we offer unique learning experiences that inspire the next generation of ocean advocates.
features.Rescue & Rehabilitation: Learn about our efforts to rescue and rehabilitate injured marine animals, preparing them for their return to the wild whenever possible.
features.Research Initiatives: Discover our ongoing research projects focused on marine conservation, breeding programs, and understanding ocean ecosystems to protect them for future generations.

sections.title: Unforgettable Experiences
sections.subtitle: Dive Into Adventure
sections.mainDescription: Take your visit to the next level with our exclusive experiences designed to bring you closer to marine life than ever before. Whether you're a certified diver or prefer to stay dry, we have thrilling adventures that create memories to last a lifetime.

features.Shark Diving: For certified divers, experience the ultimate adrenaline rush swimming alongside our magnificent sharks in complete safety with our experienced dive masters.
features.Cage Snorkeling: Not a certified diver? No problem! Our cage snorkeling experience lets you safely observe sharks and rays up close while floating at the surface.
features.Glass Bottom Boat: Glide across the surface of our main tank in our glass-bottom boat, offering a unique perspective of the underwater world below.
features.VR Zoo: Embark on a virtual reality journey to explore marine habitats from around the globe, coming face-to-face with creatures from the deepest oceans.

sections.title: Plan Your Visit
sections.subtitle: Making Memories That Last
sections.mainDescription: Everything you need to know to make the most of your visit to Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo. From opening hours to special packages, we've got options for every visitor. Plan ahead to ensure you don't miss any of the incredible experiences we offer.

features.Opening Hours: Daily 10:00 AM - 10:00 PM (Last entry 9:30 PM). Extended hours during weekends and public holidays. Please check our website for special event timings.
features.Combo Packages: Maximize your experience with our special packages that include Underwater Zoo access, Behind the Scenes tours, and exclusive animal encounters. Save up to 30% when booking multiple experiences.
features.Birthday Parties: Celebrate your special day surrounded by marine wonders with our customized birthday packages including exclusive tours, educational activities, and a dedicated party area with underwater views.
features.Annual Passes: Dive in all year round with our annual membership, offering unlimited visits, exclusive events, special discounts on experiences, and priority booking for new attractions.

sections.title: Amazing Facts
sections.subtitle: Did You Know?
sections.mainDescription: Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo holds several records and fascinating facts that make it one of the most impressive aquatic attractions in the world. From engineering marvels to conservation successes, discover what makes us truly unique.

features.World Records: Our 10-million litre tank is one of the largest suspended aquariums in the world, featuring the largest acrylic panel according to Guinness World Records.
features.Marine Diversity: We're home to over 33,000 aquatic animals representing more than 140 species, including over 300 sharks and rays combined.
features.Engineering Marvel: The aquarium panel is 32.88 meters wide, 8.3 meters tall, and 750mm thick - weighing more than 245 tonnes!
features.King Croc: Meet our famous King Croc who weighs over 750kg and is over 40 years old - one of the largest crocodiles in captivity.

sections.title: Special Programs
sections.subtitle: Unique Opportunities
sections.mainDescription: Beyond regular visits, we offer special programs that provide deeper connections with marine life. These exclusive opportunities allow guests to participate in conservation efforts, learn from experts, and create unforgettable memories.

features.Junior Marine Biologist: A hands-on program for young ocean enthusiasts aged 8-16, including behind-the-scenes access, animal feeding sessions, and a certificate of completion.
features.Sleepover with Sharks: Spend a night at the aquarium! Fall asleep watching sharks swim overhead and wake up to the morning feeding session. Includes dinner, breakfast, and exclusive activities.
features.Adopt an Animal: Support our conservation efforts by adopting one of our residents. Receive regular updates, a certificate, and special visiting privileges to see your adopted animal.
features.Photography Workshops: Learn underwater photography techniques from professionals. Capture stunning images of marine life with expert guidance and specialized equipment.

sections.title: Sustainability Initiatives
sections.subtitle: Protecting Our Oceans
sections.mainDescription: We're committed to environmental sustainability and ocean conservation. Through various initiatives and partnerships, we work to reduce our environmental impact while educating visitors about the importance of protecting marine ecosystems.

features.Plastic-Free Zone: We've eliminated single-use plastics from our facility, using eco-friendly alternatives and encouraging visitors to join our mission.
features.Coral Restoration: Our coral propagation program has successfully grown and transplanted over 1,000 coral fragments, contributing to reef restoration in the Arabian Gulf.
features.Energy Conservation: Using state-of-the-art LED lighting and energy-efficient life support systems, we've reduced our energy consumption by 40% over the past five years.
features.Community Outreach: Through beach cleanups, school programs, and public awareness campaigns, we engage over 50,000 people annually in marine conservation efforts.
